price: Nokorε, Yɛsanee (Qur’aan) no wͻ nhyira anadwo (Lailatul Qadr) no mu. Nokorε sε Yεn na Yεbͻ (nnipa) kͻkͻ.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
